artist: Engraver: Cornelis Bloemaert; Delineator: Francisco Romanelli
description: Jason with fleece over arm at center; woman stabbing dragon at lower left; warriors behind and beside her; three men at right, two on ground, one with club; three putti above Jason carrying portrait of man framed in wreath; crown and sheild on rock lower right
